sentences.sContent: If so, your wardrobe may be in need of editing.
sentences.sCn: 假如是，那么你的衣橱就需要整理了。

sentences.sContent: It connects those who want to give with those in need of receiving.
sentences.sCn: 它帮助那些希望捐赠的人和需要赠品的人取得联系。

sentences.sContent: If you keep cutting yourself off from opening up to others, you risk not sharing your skills, talents, and abilities with others in need of help.
sentences.sCn: 如果你始终拒绝向他人敞开心怀，在需要帮助时就可能出现不与他人分享你的技能、才智和能力的问题。
